name: Chicken Apocalypse
description:
Chicken Apolycapse is a 3rd person shooter where you play as a chicken who shoots the enemy snakes.

WASD to move.

M1/Left click to shoot.

R to reload.

----------------------------

Chicken Apolycapse is a game we made for a college assignment!

We're not going to commercialize it or anything like that.

Art and Sound are not ours.
